kinda new to DL torrents.... I transfer everything to my PS3 and watch it on my TV. What's the best format to DL in? MKV won't be picked up by the PS3 and I prefer the better HD. Any ideas?

@orangewedge

Download MKV2VOB, it's a free & easy to use program that will turn BR movies into MPG in a matter of seconds, which makes them playable on PS3 & you don't lose any quality.
